animal.question: I meow and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
😴 I sleep a lot!

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds.
🪶 I have feathers and webbed feet.
🗣️ I make a 'quack' sound.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I can be your best friend.
🐕 I like to go for walks.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field.
⚫ I am often black and white.
🥛 I give you milk to drink.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.
🐇 I can jump very high.

animal.question: I am big and grey and have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the biggest land animal.
🌊 I can use my nose as a water hose.

animal.question: I roar and have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am known as the king of the jungle.
🦁 The male of my species has a large mane.
🍖 I am a carnivore and eat meat.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be long and green.
🔥 Some of us are venomous.
🥚 I hatch from an egg.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I look a bit like a horse.
🦓 Each of us has a unique stripe pattern.
🌿 I graze on grasses.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean, have sharp teeth, and sometimes scare surfers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I live in saltwater.
🦷 I have rows and rows of teeth.

bug.question: I have wings and love flowers. I make yummy honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am small and fuzzy.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry heavy things with my friends. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am super strong.
🏡 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I have spots and I'm red, black, or yellow! I am considered good luck. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round.
🌱 I like to eat aphids on plants.
⚫ I often have black dots.

bug.question: I used to be a caterpillar, now I have colorful wings. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as an egg.
🌿 I eat a lot when I am young.
🌸 I love to visit flowers.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🦗 I have very strong legs for jumping.
🎶 I make noise by rubbing my legs together.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am an arachnid, not an insect!
🕷️ I can be scary or helpful depending on who you ask.
🏠 I live in a web I built myself.

bug.question: I like to eat wood and live in tunnels underground. I can damage your house! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm small and usually white or light brown.
🪵 I am a social bug and live in large colonies.
🏡 People don't want me in their houses!

bug.question: I glow in the dark to attract a mate. I can light up the night sky. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌟 My light is called bioluminescence.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.
🌙 I am most active at night.

bug.question: I bite and drink blood. I fly around and can be very annoying. Who am I?

hints.text: 🩸 Only the females bite.
🦟 I leave itchy bumps on your skin.
🌊 I breed near water.

bug.question: I'm a master of disguise, looking just like a twig or a leaf to hide from predators. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I'm long and thin like a part of a plant.
🌳 I'm hard to spot amongst the trees.
🌿 My camouflage helps me survive.
